homepage-metadata: This is the homepage where you can learn more about me and what i do.
contactpage-metadata: This is a contact page. Contact me through my social medias or via my email address or fill up the contact form and send me a message directly !
contactpage-left-text: I am open to any suggestions or just to have a chat.
contactpage-contactform-firstname-rule-l: First name must be less than 10 characters
contactpage-contactform-lastname-rule-le: Last name must be less than 10 characters
contactpage-contactform-body-rule-length: Message can not be longer than 500 caracters
contactpage-contactform-message-sending: Your message is on its way !
contactpage-contactform-message-sleep1: You probably woke up a sleepy server, he'll be up in no time !
contactpage-contactform-message-sleep2: He can be a real sleepy head sometimes ...
carousel-left-arrow-label: Unroll the carousel to the left.
carousel-right-arrow-label: Unroll the carousel to the right.
about-arrow-label: Change page of the 'about me' section
gototop-btn-label: Return to the top of the page
